blacksmith.description: The Blacksmith provides your armies with Ballistas.

capitol.description: The Capitol earns your kingdom 4000 gold per day.

castle.description: The Castle adds two arrow towers, fortifies your town's defenses, and doubles base creature growth.

citadel.description: Including a 50% increase to base creature growth, the Citadel adds a keep, and other terrain obstacles, to a town's defenses.
citadel.name: Citadel
